Module com.gyp1.inventorymgtapp
Package com.gyp1.inventorymgtapp

Class PartController

java.lang.Object
com.gyp1.inventorymgtapp.PartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The PartController contains the logic for updating the parts list in the inventory object from user input via the part-view.fxml based view, and also updating the same view with data from the model.

    • handleCancelButton

      protected void handleCancelButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The Cancel button click event handler that shows a dialog and returns to the main screen when user clicks the Yes button of the dialog. The part view screen is retained when the No button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - an instance of ActionEvent.

    • handleInHouseRadio

      protected void handleInHouseRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The InHouseRadio RadionButton click event handler. It sets the text of the lblCompanyMachine label to 'Machine ID'.
      Parameters:
      event - an instance of ActionEvent.

    • handleOutsourcedRadio

      protected void handleOutsourcedRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The InHouseRadio RadionButton click event handler. It sets the text of the lblCompanyMachine label to 'Company Name'.
      Parameters:
      event - an instance of ActionEvent.
